AMORIM is a consultancy specialized in International Solutions, providing for individuals and businesses who believe in a world without borders. We offer services related to international law, immigration, international tax, investor advisory and international business .

ABOUT THE POSITION

As a Spanish Immigration Specialist Lawyer, you will play a pivotal role in shaping and enhancing our firm's legal strategy, with a specific focus on matters pertaining to the labor sector. We are seeking a passionate legal professional with the capability to represent the firm in intricate matters, both in administrative and judicial contexts.

YOUR DAY-TO-DAY RESPONSIBILITIES

In your role as a Spanish Immigration Specialist Lawyer, your daily tasks will include:

  • Communication and Negotiation: Engage with clients, handle intriguing inquiries, and directly negotiate service agreements.
  • Research and Development: Conduct in-depth research and analysis to inform decisions, and provide specialized legal counsel through well-informed opinions.
  • Representation and Advocacy: Act as the firm's representative in highly complex legal proceedings and safeguard its interests.
  • Innovation and Leadership: Innovate and seek intelligent solutions to meet diverse legal needs, with the opportunity to take a leadership role within the firm.

THE IDEAL CANDIDATE PROFILE

The ideal candidate for this position should have:

  • Demonstrated expertise in Spanish Immigration Law, as evidenced by legal practice, scholarly research, publications, or an academic career.
  • Exceptional proficiency in verbal and written communication, both in Spanish and Portuguese.
  • A genuine passion for tackling intricate legal matters within the realm of immigration.
  • A collaborative disposition and the capability to lead complex legal projects effectively.
  • An innovative mindset and adaptability to address various legal challenges.

Amorim is an inclusive environment that values diversity and the unique contributions of each individual. If you've read and are interested in this opportunity, apply now, and let's work together to create a borderless world!

title: Senior frontend developer
description:
Welcome to KTO Group, where innovation meets excitement in the iGaming world. Founded in 2018 by Andreas Bardun, our mission is to revolutionise the online gaming experience. At KTO, we are not just a company; we re a game-changer, dedicated to enhancing transparency and player satisfaction in Sportsbook and Online Casino gaming. Dive into the heart of the action on our website: KTO.com. Here, we blend the thrill of sports betting with the magic of online casinos, tailored to resonate with diverse markets. Our commitment to being hyper-local ensures that every player feels right at home. Powered by our proprietary KTO Platform, we bring you cutting-edge technology that personalises our players journey and streamlines their experience for ultimate enjoyment. KTO is rapidly rising as a star in the LATAM region, already claiming a spot among the top 10 iGaming brands in Brazil. Our vision is bold and clear: to lead the iGaming industry in LATAM, setting new standards in trust and transparency. When you join us, you contribute towards ensuring that every play is a step towards redefining the future of iGaming.

Join KTO as a Senior Frontend Developer and collaborate with our design team to create visually stunning and highly functional web applications. You will be responsible for translating wireframes and mockups into responsive and efficient web applications using ReactJS and Gatsby. If you re passionate about creating exceptional user experiences and have a strong foundation in frontend development, we want you on our team.

Main Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with the design team to translate wireframes and mockups into functional web applications using ReactJS and Gatsby.
  • Develop and maintain reusable, efficient frontend components and implement new features to meet project requirements.
  • Integrate various data sources, such as APIs and databases, into our websites to provide dynamic content and functionality.
  • Optimize web applications for search engine visibility and performance through techniques like image optimization, code splitting, and asset optimization.
  • Write comprehensive tests to ensure the stability and reliability of the codebase, using tools like Jest and React Testing Library.
  • Participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback and ensuring code quality and best practices are maintained.
  • Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior developers, helping them grow and develop their skills.

Experience & Qualifications

  • Proven experience in frontend development, with proficiency in ReactJS and Gatsby.
  • Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with experience in building responsive and accessible web applications.
  • Experience integrating data sources, such as REST APIs and databases, into frontend applications.
  • Knowledge of web performance optimization techniques and best practices.
  • Experience writing unit tests and familiarity with testing frameworks like Jest and React Testing Library.

title: Programa de estágio 2024/2025
description:
TRANSFORMANDO O FUTURO DA LOGÍSTICA

A TMTLOG, como líder em soluções logísticas, acredita que investir em jovens talentos é fundamental para garantir um futuro promissor e inovador. Nosso programa de estágio é mais do que uma oportunidade de aprendizado; é uma jornada de desenvolvimento profissional e pessoal, onde você terá a chance de colocar em prática seus conhecimentos e contribuir para o crescimento da empresa.

Por que fazer estágio na TMTLOG?

  1. Imersão em um ambiente dinâmico: Você terá contato direto com as principais operações logísticas, desde o planejamento até a entrega.
  2. Desenvolvimento profissional: Terá acesso a treinamentos e mentorias personalizadas, além de projetos desafiadores que te farão crescer.
  3. Cultura inovadora: A TMTLOG incentiva a criatividade e a busca por soluções inovadoras, proporcionando um ambiente propício para o seu desenvolvimento.
  4. Oportunidade de efetivação: Os melhores estagiários terão a oportunidade de ingressar no quadro de colaboradores da empresa.

O que buscamos:

  1. Estudantes a partir do 2º período dos cursos de: Logística, Administração, Engenharia de Produção, e áreas afins.
  2. Proatividade e vontade de aprender: Estamos buscando jovens talentosos e dispostos a se desenvolver.
  3. Paixão por logística: Se você se interessa pelo mundo da logística e supply chain, essa é a sua oportunidade!

O que oferecemos?

  1. Bolsa auxílio: Reconhecemos o seu esforço e dedicação.
  2. Benefícios: Vale-transporte, vale-alimentação e seguro de vida.
  3. Oportunidade de crescimento: Você terá a chance de construir uma carreira sólida em uma empresa em constante expansão.
  4. Ambiente de trabalho colaborativo: Fará parte de uma equipe multidisciplinar e aprenderá com profissionais experientes.

Faça parte da nossa história!

Se você é um estudante apaixonado por logística e busca um programa de estágio que te desafie e te faça crescer, a TMTLOG é o lugar certo para você.
